issue.title: [R][CI] Use rcmdcheck feature to ignore inconsequential notes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17284](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17284). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I noticed https://r-lib.github.io/rcmdcheck/reference/rcmdcheck.html#turning-off-package-checks in the rcmdcheck docs. If we set that `Config` in DESCRIPTION, we can change rcmdcheck to error on "note", and then we'll get earlier notice about e.g. undefined global variables.
